title: Bug 4971Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971Strange 'copy package' 2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. Select xxx as destination5.
OB: As result, xx contains a package 'ui'.
SR: Create a new project xxx2. Package viewer: Select a package in project Ae.g. From the context menu choose copy4.
